Init¶

data.create_train_val_instance_channels(cfg)[source]¶

Create training and validation new data with appropiate channels based on DATA.CHANNELS for instance segmentation.

Parameters

cfg (YACS CN object) – Configuration.

Returns

train_filenames – Training image paths.

Return type

List of str

data.create_test_instance_channels(cfg)[source]¶

Create test new data with appropiate channels based on DATA.CHANNELS for instance segmentation.

Parameters

cfg (YACS CN object) – Configuration.

Returns

test_filenames – Test image paths.

Return type

List of str
